meanings.definition: The state of being uniquely identified by two distinct characteristics.
meanings.sent1: Her biuniqueness was evident in her ability to speak two languages fluently.
meanings.sent2: The biuniqueness of the rare flower made it a prized possession.
meanings.sent3: The biuniqueness of the cat wearing a hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His biuniqueness in the art world was like a rare gem among stones.
meanings.sent5: The biuniqueness of the double rainbow left a lasting impression on all who saw it.

meanings.definition: The quality of being the only one of its kind in a specific context.
meanings.sent1: The biuniqueness of the ancient artifact amazed the archaeologists.
meanings.sent2: In a world of copies, her biuniqueness shone brightly.
meanings.sent3: The biuniqueness of the talking parrot entertained the guests at the party.
meanings.sent4: His biuniqueness in the field of science was like a beacon of innovation.
meanings.sent5: The biuniqueness of the glowing firefly captured the child's imagination.
